title: The Eight Hour Hell
description: He cannot die for eight hours. Jerry's best friend has been murdered by the Numbers gang. Through a quirk of fate he has been blessed by a goddess. Now he may have his revenge. He will die in eight hours. Jerry has fallen in love with Alice, a reluctant former member of the gang. He only has until dawn to rescue her. In a dystopian future where gangs rule the parts of the city the police do not dare to tread; for one brief night, he will be the only thing they fear. Eight hours of life, Eight hours till death.
author: H.M. Reynolds
